meanings.definition: The action of spreading scandalous rumors or gossip.
meanings.sent1: Her scandalmongering caused a lot of trouble in our community.
meanings.sent2: The scandalmongering in the office was getting out of hand.
meanings.sent3: The scandalmongering at school made everyone whisper and giggle.
meanings.sent4: The scandalmongering was like a wildfire, spreading quickly through the town.
meanings.sent5: The scandalmongering painted a dark cloud over the peaceful town.

meanings.definition: A person who spreads scandalous rumors or gossip.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the scandalmongering queen of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The scandalmongering was always quick to share the latest juicy gossip.
meanings.sent3: The scandalmongering's tales were like a never-ending soap opera.
meanings.sent4: The scandalmongering was a walking scandal, always stirring up drama.
meanings.sent5: The scandalmongering's words were like poison, infecting everyone around.
